categoryInvalid: Category must be a valid MongoDB ID
priceInvalid: Price must be a positive number
searchKeywordsArray: Search keywords must be an array
searchKeywordLength: Each search keyword must be at least 3 characters long
showOnHomeBoolean: Show on home must be a boolean
tagLength: Each tag must be at least 3 characters long
subCategoryInvalid: Subcategory must be a valid MongoDB ID
projectIdInvalid: Project ID must be a valid MongoDB ID
searchLength: Search query must be at least 3 characters long
addressLength: Address query must be at least 3 characters long
userInvalid: User ID must be a valid MongoDB ID
priceFromInvalid: Price from must be a positive number
priceToInvalid: Price to must be a positive number
startDateISO8601: Start date must be in ISO 8601 format
endDateISO8601: End date must be in ISO 8601 format
jobDetailsString: Job details must be a string
startDateFuture: Start date must be in the future
bookingIdInvalid: Booking ID must be a valid MongoDB identifier
